reviewText: This series has been really entertaining!  The characters are all great and completely believable. There is always an excellent story line, suspense, murder, love, and laughter.  You will not be disappointed in any of the episodes in this series.  But, keep your dvd control handy to stop and reverse...the Sicilians talk very very fast and the English subtitles don't stay on the screen long (:-)) Enjoy!
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: Luca Zingaretti is BACK on his game.  I had watched all of them and the previous two, Episodes 23 and 24 were really disappointing.  I almost didn't purchase these new ones.  I'm glad I did.  They're excellent.  Good stories, well acted.  Detective Montalbano continues to be a great character worth following.  The ending left room for future interesting stories.  The only thing I miss is the change in his girlfriend.  Liked the previous one much better.
summary: XZingaretti is BACK on his game.  Fantastic!
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: So nice to get new Montalbano shows.  I've read all the novels (that have been translated) and even got the original shows from Australia when they first came out.  The acting is great and the writers do a great job of staying with the story as the author wrote.  I've seen the DVDs many times and never get tired of these stories.
summary: New Montalbano shows very good.  Enjoy, but see them in order
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: For viewers who have followed the entire Montalbano series, Episode 26 is a must-see.  This is one of the best, weaving together multiple story lines from previous episodes and culminating in a particularly powerful ending.  Of course, Fazio, Augella and Catarella are all present and do their parts in creating a lot of smiles along the way.  I hope there will be more to come.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: I hope this is not the end of the show, I have really enjoyed all the ones that I have watched. I can watch these over and over and never tire of them. I'm even picking up some Italian.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: It's too bad that these episodes are the last ones -- at least for now -- because this detective and his crew always produce a good story and, unlike almost all such series, they include humor and the kinds of characters in Montalbano's squad that you'd like to meet in real life.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26

reviewText: EASY TO READ SUBTITLES. VERY ENGAGING STORIES.EXCELLENT CAST, IN BOTH THE LEADING ROLES AND CHARACTER SUPPORT. TRUE TO THE ORIGINAL BOOKS.
summary: WELL WORTH ADDING TO THE COLLECTIONS.
Title: Detective Montalbano: Episodes 25 & 26
